description: '''Latin metal''' ({{Langx|es|metal latino}}, {{Langx|pt|metal latino-americano}}) is a subgenre of [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] music with [[Latin music (genre)|Latin]] origins, influences, and instrumentation, such as [[Spanish language|Spanish]] vocals, [[Latin percussion]] and rhythm such as [[Salsa music#Rhythm|Salsa rhythm]]. Some South American bands also add influences and instrumentations borrowed from [[world music]] and ethnic music, relating to musical traditions of the indigenous people of America.
